alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:24PM CDT until August 06 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR TALLADEGA...SOUTHWESTERN CALHOUN...EASTERN SHELBY...ST. CLAIR AND NORTHERN COOSA COUNTIES... At 324 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Springville to near Pell City to Lay Lake, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Talladega, Sylacauga, Pell City, Childersburg, Columbiana, Springville, Odenville, Wilsonville, Goodwater, Talladega Springs, Stewartville, Weogufka, Lincoln, Margaret, Ashville, Riverside, Vincent, Ragland, Harpersville and Munford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
